name: Ostentatious Display
text: Your extravagant jewelry and accessories give you an air of importance you can use to your advantage in many social situations.
benefit:
As long as you are wearing a valuable nonmagical item in a magic item slot, you gain a +1 bonus on skill checks with a corresponding skill. Bonuses from wearing items in multiple slots that affect the same skill do not stack.

Each item must be worth at least 5% of your character wealth by level (see Table 12–4 on page 399 of the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook). For example, a 6th-level PC gains a +1 bonus on Bluff checks while wearing a gem-studded tiara (which fills the headband slot) worth at least 800 gp. When she reaches 7th level, she must wear an accessory in the appropriate slot worth at least 1,175 gp in order to continue gaining this bonus.
text_zh: 你奢侈的首饰与配件让你看起来非常重要，使你在社交场合得到许多优势。
benefit_zh:
只要你在正常穿戴魔法物品的栏位装备有价的非魔法物品，让你在对应的技能上得到+1的加值。在多个位置穿着影响同一个技能的配件效果并不会叠加。要进行炫富，该装备的价值必须达到你该等级标准财产的5%，例如要得到+1唬弄加值，一个六级的玩者人物必须穿戴一个价值800gp，镶满宝石的头环，而一个七级的人物则需装备价值1175gp的头环。

装备位置：

腰带、胸口、肩膀：+1威吓

身体、脖子、脚部：+1交涉

额头、眼睛、双手：+1唬弄

头部、戒子、手腕：+1表演
